attributes.action: Stop or limit airport drop off charges at london/luton airport.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign and maybe we can get them to show some respect to the customers that keep the airport in operation.https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1194902623881700&id=1106010896104207
attributes.background: £1, then £2.50 now its going up to £3.00. Luton airport is ripping off the public with its disgraceful drop off charges. They make no effort to improve access to the airport and just continue to charge people more for less. Something has to be done about these crooks.

rejection.details:
This is a commercial decision for Luton Airport. You might like to sign this petition, however, which is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/162496
